sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tutorial', templateUrl: './tutorial.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tutorial.component.scss'] }) export class TutorialComponent { isLogged: boolean = false; ngOnInit() { this.checkLog() } checkLog() { let user = localStorage.getItem('user'); if (user) { this.isLogged = true; } } }
